verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <WH1984> Praise יָ֨הּ ׀ <WH3050> ye the LORD אַשְׁרֵי־ <WH835> Blessed אִ֭ישׁ <WH376> [is] the man יָרֵ֣א <WH3372> [that] feareth אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּ֝מִצְוֹתָ֗יו <WH4687> in his commandments חָפֵ֥ץ <WH2654> [that] delighteth מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> greatly

גִּבּ֣וֹר <WH1368> shall be mighty בָּ֭אָרֶץ <WH776> upon earth יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become זַרְע֑וֹ <WH2233> His seed דּ֭וֹר <WH1755> the generation יְשָׁרִ֣ים <WH3477> of the upright יְבֹרָֽךְ׃ <WH1288> shall be blessed
הוֹן־ <WH1952> Wealth וָעֹ֥שֶׁר <WH6239> and riches בְּבֵית֑וֹ <WH1004> [shall be] in his house וְ֝צִדְקָת֗וֹ <WH6666> and his righteousness עֹמֶ֥דֶת <WH5975> endureth לָעַֽד׃ <WH5703> for ever

זָ֘רַ֤ח <WH2224> there ariseth בַּחֹ֣שֶׁךְ <WH2822> in the darkness א֭וֹר <WH216> light לַיְשָׁרִ֑ים <WH3477> Unto the upright חַנּ֖וּן <WH2587> [he is] gracious וְרַח֣וּם <WH7349> and full of compassion וְצַדִּֽיק׃ <WH6662> and righteous

טֽוֹב־ <WH2896> A good אִ֭ישׁ <WH376> man חוֹנֵ֣ן <WH2603> sheweth favour וּמַלְוֶ֑ה <WH3867> and lendeth יְכַלְכֵּ֖ל <WH3557> he will guide דְּבָרָ֣יו <WH1697> his affairs בְּמִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> with discretion

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> for ever לֹא־ <WH3808> not יִמּ֑וֹט <WH4131> Surely he shall not be moved לְזֵ֥כֶר <WH2143> remembrance ע֝וֹלָ֗ם <WH5769> shall be in everlasting יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become צַדִּֽיק׃ <WH6662> the righteous

מִשְּׁמוּעָ֣ה <WH8052> tidings רָ֭עָה <WH7451> of evil לֹ֣א <WH3808> He will not יִירָ֑א <WH3372> He shall not be afraid נָכ֥וֹן <WH3559> is fixed לִ֝בּ֗וֹ <WH3820> his heart בָּטֻ֥חַ <WH982> trusting בַּיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> in the LORD

סָמ֣וּךְ <WH5564> [is] established לִ֭בּוֹ <WH3820> His heart לֹ֣א <WH3808> he will not יִירָ֑א <WH3372> he shall not be afraid עַ֖ד <WH5704> Until אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> he יִרְאֶ֣ה <WH7200> until he see בְצָרָֽיו׃ <WH6862> [his desire] upon his enemies

פִּזַּ֤ר ׀ <WH6340> He hath dispersed נָ֘תַ֤ן <WH5414> he hath given לָאֶבְיוֹנִ֗ים <WH34> to the poor צִ֭דְקָתוֹ <WH6666> his righteousness עֹמֶ֣דֶת <WH5975> endureth לָעַ֑ד <WH5703> for ever קַ֝רְנ֗וֹ <WH7161> his horn תָּר֥וּם <WH7311> shall be exalted בְּכָבֽוֹד׃ <WH3519> with honour

רָ֘שָׁ֤ע <WH7563> The wicked יִרְאֶ֨ה ׀ <WH7200> shall see וְכָעָ֗ס <WH3707> [it] and be grieved שִׁנָּ֣יו <WH8127> with his teeth יַחֲרֹ֣ק <WH2786> he shall gnash וְנָמָ֑ס <WH4549> and melt away תַּאֲוַ֖ת <WH8378> the desire רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> of the wicked תֹּאבֵֽד׃ <WH6> shall perish
